author: "Maya Lapp"
date: "12/13/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r load_data}
recap_data <- read_excel("All Recaps Dec 9 2021.xls") 
band_data <- read_excel("All bands Dec 9 2021.xls") %>% 
  rename(Net = `Net/box`)

all_data <- recap_data %>% full_join(band_data)

all_data <- all_data %>% 
  rename(banding_date = `Banding Date`, recapture_date = `Recapture Date`, how_captured = `How Captured`, band_number = `Band Number`, wing_chord = `Wing Chord`) %>% 
  mutate(net_number = as.numeric(Net))

```

```{r}
all_data %>% 
  group_by(net_number) %>% 
  summarize(num_birds= n())

all_data %>% 
  group_by(net_number, Species) %>% 
  summarize(num_birds= n())
```
